Fetch the store name and a single product. The product should include a title, description, images, and the price.

{
  shop {
    name
  }
  product(id: "gid://shopify/Product/$Product") {
    title
    description
    images(first: 1) {
      edges {
        node {
          url
        }
      }
    }
    variants(first: 1) {
      edges {
        node {
          price {
            amount
            currencyCode
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
----------
Fetch the first 10 products, and order them by price.

{
  products(first: 10, sortKey: PRICE) {
    edges {
      node {
        title
        description
        images(first: 1) {
          edges {
            node {
              url
            }
          }
        }
        variants(first: 1) {
          edges {
            node {
              price {
                amount
                currencyCode
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
